sentences.en: Charles Tandy , who owned Radio Shack , asked me to come and work for him.
sentences.cn: 沙克广播电台的所有人查尔斯·坦迪邀请我到他那里工作.

sentences.en: He had to sit down five times before he reached his shack.
sentences.cn: 在走到他的茅棚以前,他不得不坐在地上歇了五次.

sentences.en: He urinated outside the shack and then went up the road to wake the boy.
sentences.cn: 他在窝棚外撒了尿,然后顺着大路走去叫醒孩子.

sentences.en: I don't have to shack up every girl I know. "
sentences.cn: 我不一定同我认识的每个女郎都要过夜. ”

sentences.en: I moved away from the shack and picked my way among the rubble.
sentences.cn: 我离开木屋，小心地走在瓦砾间。

sentences.en: I'm shacking up with my cousin till I find a place of my own.
sentences.cn: 直到我找到自己的房子我将与表弟住在一起

sentences.en: Inside the shack workers were bolting down their lunch.
sentences.cn: 在简陋的棚屋里,工人们狼吞虎咽地吃着午餐.

sentences.en: Or, maybe you want us to just go off and shack up?
sentences.cn: 是不是你想让我们走得远远的去同居 吧 ?”

sentences.en: She stepped over to the cook shack and looked in.
sentences.cn: 思嘉边说边走到厨房前面,往里面看了看.

sentences.en: The boys made a shack out of the old boards in the backyard.
sentences.cn: 男孩们在后院用旧木板盖起一间小木屋.

sentences.en: The mast was nearly as long as the one room of the shack.
sentences.cn: 桅杆跟这窝棚内的单间屋子差不多一般长.

sentences.en: The shack said: " Hit the grit, you son of a toad. "
sentences.cn: 司闸员说: “ 从货车上跳下去, 你这个混蛋. ”

sentences.en: They have since knocked down the shack.
sentences.cn: 从那以后他们拆掉了简陋的棚屋。

sentences.en: They've decided to shack up together in her flat.
sentences.cn: 他们决定在她的公寓里同居.

sentences.en: Up the road, in his shack, the old man was sleeping again.
sentences.cn: 在大路另一头老人的窝棚里, 他又睡着了.

sentences.en: You mean that old shack? How ugly!
sentences.cn: 你说是那所老木屋 吗 ?多难看!

phrases.tran_cn: 同住：生活、居住或停留在某处

trans.tran_cn: 窝棚，简陋的小屋，<俚>无线电收发室，<美>游民，驽马，废马
trans.tran_en: a small building that has not been built very well
